#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define PI 3.14159265359
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int themax=0;
	int sum=0,t;
	int n,m,i;
	cin>>n>>m;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>t;
		sum+=t;
		themax=max(themax,t);
	}
	if(sum!=m)
	{
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		return 0;
	}
	if(sum%2==0)
	{
		if(themax>sum/2)
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	}
	else
	{
		if(themax>sum/2+1)
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
